unittitle_ssm: Board of Higher Education of the City of New York Academic Freedom Case Files
abstract_ssm: This collection consists primarily of transcripts and testimony from hearings and investigations conducted by the State Board of Higher Education of the City of New York.  The materials focus on alleged Communist Party activities of eight faculty members at City College of New York, Hunter College and Queens College.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Teachers' Union of the City of New York
New York (State). Legislature. Joint Legislative Committee to Investigate the Educational System of the State of New York
City University of New York. City College
Communist Party of the United States of America (New York)
subject_ssm: College teachers -- Political activity -- United States.
Academic freedom -- New York (State) -- New York
